cd:Record.cd:Description: Information regarding binary file format and time coordinates of the image

cd:Text.cd:Description: Name of the associated binary file

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Total number of lines (azimuth) of the image
Total number of samples (range) of the image
Number of bytes at the beginning of the file containing the header information
Number of bytes at the beginning of each line containing header information

cd:Text.cd:Description: Byte format type: FLOAT_COMPLEX, FLOAT32, DOUBLE_COMPLEX, FLOAT64, INT16, SHORT_COMPLEX, INT32, INT_COMPLEX, INT8, INT8_COMPLEX

cd:Record.cd:Description: Information regarding the region of interest related to the raster data
Information regarding the dataset

cd:Text.cd:Description: Name of the sensor used to acquire the image: ASAR, PALSAR, ...
Image type: RAW DATA, RANGE FOCUSED, AZIMUTH FOCUSED
Image projection: SLANT RANGE, GROUND RANGE

cd:Type.cd:Description: Azimuth antenna steering rate polynomial reference time

cd:Record.cd:Description: Azimuth antenna steering rate polynomial coefficients: const [rad/s], az [rad/s^2], az^2 [rad/s^3]

cd:Type.cd:Description: Number of echoes for each burst
Value of the commandable Rx attenuation in the receiver channel

cd:Record.cd:Description: Azimuth relative times for each missing line
Azimuth relative times for each SWST change
SWST changes values
Azimuth relative times for each noise packet
Azimuth relative times for each internal calibration packet

cd:Type.cd:Description: Number of bursts in the swath
Number of lines in each burst
Azimuth start time relative to the absolute value reported in RasterInfo

cd:Text.cd:Description: Direction of the orbit: ASCENDING, DESCENDING

cd:Record.cd:Description: Orbit state vectors position coordinates (xyz)
Orbit state vectors velocity coordinates

cd:Text.cd:Description: Azimuth absolute start time for the first state vector

cd:Type.cd:Description: Azimuth time interval between two consecutive state vectors

cd:Text.cd:Description: Azimuth absolute time of the ascending node

cd:Record.cd:Description: Coordinates of the ascending node
Polynomial coefficients: const, rg, az, az*rg, rg^2, rg^3, rg^4
Polynomial coefficients: const, rg, az, az*rg, rg^2, rg^3, rg^4
Polynomial coefficients: const, rg, az, az*rg, rg^2, rg^3, rg^4
Polynomial coefficients: const, rg, az, az*rg, rg^2, rg^3, rg^4
Polynomial coefficients: const, rg, az, az*rg, rg^2, rg^3, rg^4
Polynomial coefficients: const, rg, az, az*rg, rg^2, rg^3, rg^4
Polynomial coefficients: const, rg, az, az*rg, rg^2, rg^3, rg^4

cd:Text.cd:Description: Azimuth absolute start time for the first attitude value

cd:Type.cd:Description: Azimuth time interval between two consecutive attitude values

cd:Record.cd:Description: Yaw angle values
Pitch angle values
Roll angle values

cd:Text.cd:Description: Rotation order: YPR, YRP, PRY, PYR, RPY, RYP

cd:Record.cd:Description: Polynomial coefficients of Range
Polynomial coefficients of Azimuth
